banner.title: Green Energy Leading Company
banner.subTitle:
LTechUVC is a global leader in carbon neutrality
making the earth healthy with green energy

item1.title: Business
item1.subTitle:
LTechUVC is a hydrogen-based green energy company that is expanding its scope into various fields such as green hydrogen, 
green ammonia manufacturing business, fuel cell power generation business,
and hydrogen convergence business

item2.title: Last climate warning of 1.5°C
item2.subTitle:
If the Earth's temperature rises by 1.5°C in the future, humanity's future may disappear due to many negative factors such as forest fires caused by heat waves, tsunamis due to melting glaciers, etc. 
LTechUVC is leading the global market as a company that takes the lead in protecting the global environment through carbon neutrality.
